meanings.definition: Consisting of various colors or elements; diverse.
meanings.sent1: The motliest flowers bloomed in the garden, showcasing a mix of red, yellow, and purple petals.
meanings.sent2: Her wardrobe was the motliest collection of clothing, with patterns and colors from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The motliest group of birds gathered on the tree branch, each one a different color.
meanings.sent4: The motliest sky greeted us at dawn, with hues of pink, orange, and blue blending together.
meanings.sent5: The motliest painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention, with its vibrant mix of colors and shapes.

meanings.sent1: The motliest selection of fruits at the market included apples, oranges, and bananas.
meanings.sent2: The motliest group of students in the class came from different countries and spoke various languages.
meanings.sent3: The motliest flavors of ice cream were available at the shop, from chocolate to mint to strawberry.
meanings.sent4: The motliest crowd gathered at the concert, representing fans of all ages and backgrounds.
meanings.sent5: The motliest collection of books in the library covered a wide range of genres and topics.

meanings.definition: Composed of various types or kinds.
meanings.sent1: The motliest assortment of candies filled the jar, from gummy bears to sour worms.
meanings.sent2: The motliest assortment of toys in the store catered to children of all ages.
meanings.sent3: The motliest mix of music genres played at the festival, pleasing the diverse crowd.
meanings.sent4: The motliest collection of seashells on the beach included conch shells, starfish, and sand dollars.
meanings.sent5: The motliest array of vegetables at the market offered everything from carrots to broccoli to bell peppers.
